roleset.name: to raise or lift
roleset.note: ELEVATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'elevate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from elevate.01-v predicate notes)
ELEVATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with elevate.01 (from elevation.01-n)
ELEVATED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to elevate.01. Elevate.01 is a member of Vn class put_direction-9.4. Framed by Katie. (from elevated.01-j)

roles.note: In 'What is the elevation of Denver?" 'elevation' is not eventive. (from elevation.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The bill also elevates even minor rule infractions to felonies and provides for recovery of punitive damages in civil lawsuits and arbitration cases without any showing of willful misconduct .

example.name: All Args
example.text: The officials' elevation of the disaster to a level 14 disaster predictably caused panic.

example.name: Args 1 and 2
example.text: Velocities are elevated to 196 cm/sec in the left distal common or proximal external iliac artery.
example.arg: in the left distal common or proximal external iliac artery.

example.name: static endpoint
example.text: The CEA is elevated at 7.8 although patient was a long-time smoker.
example.arg: although the patient was a long-time smoker.
